named-query.name: MeteringPoint.findByExternalCode
named-query.query: select t from MeteringPoint t where t.externalCode=:externalCode

named-query.name: LastLoadInfo.findByExternalCodeAndParamCode
named-query.query: select t from LastLoadInfo t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode and t.sourceParamCode=:sourceParamCode

named-query.name: PeriodTimeValueRaw.findByEntity
named-query.query: select t from PeriodTimeValueRaw t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode and t.meteringDate=:meteringDate and t.sourceSystemCode=:sourceSystemCode and t.sourceUnitCode=:sourceUnitCode and t.sourceParamCode=:sourceParamCode

named-query.name: AtTimeValueRaw.findByEntity
named-query.query: select t from AtTimeValueRaw t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode and t.meteringDate=:meteringDate and t.sourceSystemCode=:sourceSystemCode and t.sourceUnitCode=:sourceUnitCode and t.sourceParamCode=:sourceParamCode

named-query.name: PeriodTimeValue.findByEntity
named-query.query: select t from PeriodTimeValue t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode and t.meteringDate=:meteringDate and t.sourceType.sourceSystemCode=:sourceSystemCode and t.status=:status and t.sourceUnitCode=:sourceUnitCode and t.sourceParamCode=:sourceParamCode

named-query.name: PeriodTimeValue.findByExternalCode
named-query.query: select t from PeriodTimeValue t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode and t.meteringDate between :meteringDateStart and :meteringDateEnd order by t.sourceMeteringPointCode, t.meteringDate, t.sourceParamCode

named-query.name: AtTimeValue.findByExternalCode
named-query.query: select t from AtTimeValue t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode

named-query.name: AtTimeValue.findByEntity
named-query.query: select t from AtTimeValue t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode and t.meteringDate=:meteringDate and t.sourceType.sourceSystemCode=:sourceSystemCode and t.status=:status and t.sourceUnitCode=:sourceUnitCode and t.sourceParamCode=:sourceParamCode

named-query.name: ExportData.findExportData
named-query.query: select t from ExportData t where t.sourceMeteringPointCode=:sourceMeteringPointCode and meteringDate between :startDate and :endDate order by t.sourceMeteringPointCode, t.meteringDate
